infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to organize your media by location and time.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to delete photos from your library when you choose to clean up your media.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location services to provide location names for your photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow PhotoMap to access your photos to organize them by location and time.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow PhotoMap to save photos to your library.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow PhotoMap to use your location to provide location names for your photos.
